alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 9:13AM EST until further notice by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray ME has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Belknap and Merrimack Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Suncook River at North Chichester. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flood waters surround homes and roads in the Riverside Drive community off Pinewood Road in Allenstown. Water up to Jasper Drive, Bourge Roads, and Albin Avenue. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM EST Monday the stage was 5.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 10.4 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
